name: BABE
description:
Controls: A & D to move.

My first attempt at a "game" if you can even call it that. I just followed a tutorial for the most part.

For some reason I think the game runs best in browsers that aren't Chrome, like Firefox or Microsoft Edge. So if the game is running slowly, I would suggest trying those or downloading the  game.

Here's a tutorial of how to play the game, by a friend of mine: https://streamable.com/xhzs0l
